G2 Class

Extends VectorN
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/G2.ts:122
Module: EIGHT

Constructs a G2. The multivector is initialized to zero.

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/G2.ts:144

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/G2.ts:132

The coordinate corresponding to the unit standard basis scalar.

β

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/G2.ts:168

The coordinate corresponding to the e1e2 standard basis bivector.
